text: Is the page loading shell.js before the <script> or after?  If it is loading it after, when it hits <script> it won't know what hbspt is, yet, which will return this error.
<@U012W4YEUTX> How can I use pagination to get all contacts of list ? Do you have example api call url?

Hey everyone! New here, apologies if this is the wrong channel.

I have a question about the Ecom bridge API - it appears that if a contact has been deleted manually from the CRM in the past, the Ecom bridge API can not re-add the same contact back in to the CRM.

Is this the case? If so, is there a work around?

Is there a way to determine what an Id number references? For example, I am seeing `"dealID" :2305421282,"` in my JSON output. Is there a way to determine what that Deal ID references (which deal)? I also see `"associateVids" :[401,452,951],"`. I think vids are a reference to contacts, correct? So is there also a way to determine which contact those numbers correlate to as well?
You can use the `GET /crm/v3/objects/deals/{dealId}` endpoint to retrieve whatever information you need about a deal.  Details here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals>
There are similar endpoints for contacts, companies, all the CRM objects...
Hi! It does not seem to even load on the page. Do I have to do ir manually?
